title: Internet problems
body: My internet is not realy bad but sometimes it just turns off, and then when i'm playing lol I disconnect, i've had a leaverbuster 2 times. If I get banned bcz of my internet is it possible then to get unbanned?{{champion:157}}

replies.body:
[Leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalties cannot be removed. This is because regardless of intent, disconnecting from a match negatively impacts everyone in it. Because of this, the system treats all disconnections equally and it's a key reason why penalties cannot be modified in any way.

If you can dive into deeper details how your internet turns off, we can troubleshoot the core reason why you're disconnecting so future penalties are less likely to happen.
